entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
